scripts.start: concurrently "BROWSER=none npm run react-start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run electron-start"
scripts.startwin: concurrently "npm run react-start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run electron-startwin"
scripts.demo: concurrently "BROWSER=none npm run react-start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run electron-demo"
scripts.demo-win: concurrently "npm run react-start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run electron-demo-win"
scripts.package: npm run prepackage && electron-builder build -c.extraMetadata.main=build/electron/main.js --publish never && npm run postpackage
scripts.prepackage: npm run react-build && npm run electron-build
scripts.postpackage: mkdir dist/hook && cp hook/hook dist/hook/. && cp hook/hook.exe dist/hook/.
scripts.electron-build: mkdir build/src && cp -r electron/. build/electron && cp -r src/shared/. build/src/shared
